explanation: The code used min(d_list) but it should use the largest value from d_list. The expression p - q + a is intended to apply the best (maximum) benefit from d_list, so a must be max(d_list). I fixed that single line to use max instead of min.
fixed_code:
n, p, q = map(int,input().split())
d_list = [int(e) for e in input().split()]

a = max(d_list)

print(min(p-q+a,p))
